Articles.Content:
It was a reference to the TV show Red Dwarf, where Rimmer says 'For us it's just "Mind that bus" "What bus?" Splat.'

I thought you were talking about The Dark Night.... (actually it was "What bus driver" but nevermind)
shouldn't the ground be below me-
Bill, for the thousandth time: don't text while piloting a space ship.
"The launchpad will totally support my 400 ton super rocket"
Don't worry guys, I got this.
hmm. decouple those engines on my 250 ton dunar lander. parachutes are enou-AUGHHHHHHHHHHHHHH
Is it supposed to be on fire?
Wait... If the altimeter says 5000, the why does surface look so much closer?
Hey look, it's the kraken!
oh hi danny........ *endgame*
I think I can land on Jool
It's okay, radiation isn't that deadly.
"With that rad-proof suit, I can go anywhere now! All the loot in the bottom of those radiation-soaked mineshafts will be mine!"
Hmm. A Jool periapsis of ~5,000m is probably good for aerobraking.
Why are my srb's flying past me?

All right, maybe we should stop the reactor.

(said on April, 26, 1986)

All right, maybe we should stop the reactor.

(said on April, 26, 1986)

Is that the Chernobyl accident?
Okay ,lest wing it!

Wait, was that thrust value in Newtons or pounds?

Nah, it's okay, I'll just take a nap and let MechJeb do the circularization burn. It'll get it more accurately than I would anyway.

You said this laser was how many gigawatts again?

Hey, check it out! I got our intercept distance down to 0.0 meters!

Wait, THIS switch controls power to the antimatter containment? Well, I'll be darned. I thought I was shutting off power to the coffee ma
Trust me, I know what I'm doing.
I'm going to annoy a space marine!
Oh crap, I forgot the parachutes...
What could possibly go wrong?
Dude, hold my beer!

I wonder what happens when I press this button?

edit: dang, maybe I should of read the pages first, someone already thought of that on the 1st page. Have a different one: "What do you mean Eeloo is a long way away, I only brought food for 2 weeks!"

Edited November 17, 2014 by Norpo
department of redundancy department
